description:
The Spirit Molecule is a substance our body naturally produces which 
allows our soul to enter and exit Our physical Body. -
-
Our pineal gland produces this substance 3 major times during human lifespan, 1st at birth when the soul enters the Body, 2nd at the time of death when the soul leaves the body and every night when we enter Rem Sleep and the soul astral Projects using an astral Cord to keep us connected to our physical body. -
-
When we are freed from our physical body we are able to experience higher dimensions and higher levels of consciousness, once we enter the spirit realm we begin to remember who we are and the lives weâ€™ve lived in between lives. -
